name: 3dLMEr
author: AFNI Developers
description: Program for Voxelwise Linear Mixed-Effects (LME) Analysis

inputs.description: Specify the lower and upper bounds for outlier removal
inputs.name: Lower Bound

inputs.description: Specify the lower and upper bounds for outlier removal
inputs.name: Upper Bound

inputs.description: Use AFNI's C io functions
inputs.name: Use CIO

inputs.description: List the data structure with a header as the first line
inputs.name: Input Data Table

inputs.description: Enable R to save the parameters for debugging
inputs.name: Debug Arguments

inputs.description: Specify a general linear F-style (GLF) formulation
inputs.name: GLF Code

inputs.description: Specify the label and weights of interest in a general linear t-style (GLT) formulation
inputs.name: GLT Code

inputs.description: Display the help message
inputs.name: Help

inputs.description: Specify the column name for input files of effect estimate
inputs.name: Input File Column

inputs.description: Number of jobs for parallel computing
inputs.name: Number of Jobs

inputs.description: Process voxels inside this mask only
inputs.name: Mask File

inputs.description: Specify the model structure for all the variables
inputs.name: Model Formula

inputs.description: Output file name
inputs.name: Output Prefix

inputs.description: Specify centering values for quantitative variables
inputs.name: QVar Centers

inputs.name: Quantitative Variables

inputs.description: Output file name for the residuals
inputs.name: Residuals Output Prefix

inputs.description: Use R's io functions
inputs.name: Use RIO

inputs.description: List of allowed options
inputs.name: Show Allowed Options

inputs.description: Specify the type for sums of squares in the F-statistics
inputs.name: Sums of Squares Type

inputs.description: Perform test-retest reliability analysis
inputs.name: Test-Retest Reliability

inputs.description: Specify centering values for voxel-wise covariates
inputs.name: VVar Centers
